history.narrative: Law 20-266, the “Human Rights Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-803. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 28, 2014, and December 2, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 25, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-605 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-266 became effective May 2, 2015.
